attributes.action: Deport illegal immigrants back to their country
attributes.additional_details: Illegal immigrants are putting the local councils under pressure to build thousands of homes everywhere. We won't have any green belt woodlands or countryside left. Wildlife animals habitats will be destroyed and pushed to extinction. They adding to the population of the UK. They are not contributing anything to the UK and are putting a strain on the NHS etc
attributes.background: Illegal immigrants are flooding the UK and not sent back. Thought under EU rules your supposed to stop off at the first safe country

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/321862
